vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Ammonites living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.11.1
§ Nahash = "serpent"
n pr m
1) a king of the Ammonites during the time of king Saul
2) the father of Abigail, the mother of Amasa, the commander of Absalom's army
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   serpiente ; (2a)   rey de Amón; en tiempos de Saúl; (2b)   padre de Abigail y Seruiá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿轄 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "大蛇"
1) 掃羅王時代的一位亞捫人的王 (撒上 11:1-2;12:12)
2) 亞比該的父親, 亞比該是亞瑪撒的母親, 亞瑪撒是押沙龍軍隊的指揮官 (撒下 17:25)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拿辖 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "大蛇"
1) 扫罗王时代的一位亚扪人的王 (撒上 11:1-2;12:12)
2) 亚比该的父亲, 亚比该是亚玛撒的母亲, 亚玛撒是押沙龙军队的指挥官 (撒下 17:25)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Ammonites living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.10.2;
father of: Hanun (H2586)
§ Nahash = "serpent"
n pr m
1) a king of the Ammonites during the time of king Saul
2) the father of Abigail, the mother of Amasa, the commander of Absalom's army

A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.17.25;
wife of: Jesse (H3448H);
mother of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Ozem (H0684), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)
§ Nahash = "serpent"
n pr m
1) a king of the Ammonites during the time of king Saul
2) the father of Abigail, the mother of Amasa, the commander of Absalom's army

A man of the Ammonites living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.17.27;
father of: Shobi (H7629)
§ Nahash = "serpent"
n pr m
1) a king of the Ammonites during the time of king Saul
2) the father of Abigail, the mother of Amasa, the commander of Absalom's army

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.12;
son of: Tehinnah (H8468)
